name: Smack - The Puzzle Game
description:
A simple but addictive game here for you to enjoy!

You can swipe Left/ Right/ Up/ Down to move any ball you want to.

Just simply flick this or that ball to bump the others out of the table.
The level will be cleared if there’s only one ball left.

The difficulty and the number of balls will increase through each level, so prepare for your best strategy.

Now, let’s see how many level can you clear!
